courses.name: 서호공원
courses.advice_short_en: Okay to run with some caution ⚠️
courses.advice_detail_ko: 쌀쌀한 편입니다. 긴팔, 긴바지 또는 얇은 레이어링을 추천합니다. 약한 바람으로 러닝에 큰 지장은 없습니다. 노면이 건조해서 미끄럼 위험이 적습니다. 공기질이 보통 수준입니다. 미세먼지에 민감하다면 마스크를 고려해도 좋습니다. 추가 주의 요인: 야간 주의. 컨디션에 따라 강도를 조절하고, 평소보다 몸 상태를 더 자주 점검해 주세요.
courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Light breeze with little impact on running. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Extra cautions: Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.

courses.name: 청소년문화센터

courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Extra cautions: Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
